Pothole Ranking System
Pothole Ranking System
Feb 2016 - Present
Feb 2016 - Present
Uses Location Services and Sensor Manager on the client side android app to get GPS and accelerometer readings. On the server side the machine learns based on SVM with a sliding window approach to classify between potholes, accidents and smooth riding. Maps API is used for visualization. A crowd sourced android app stores and sends the log file [GPS and accelerometer readings] collected by the biker, into the server where the data is segregated and along with the previous history of that location, is used to generate a score for the pothole. These values are plotted on a heat map of the city.
